trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked ask [Enter the largest card number:] and wait set [number of dots v] to (answer) set [binary cards v] to (join (answer) [, ]) repeat until <(number of dots) = [1]> set [number of dots v] to ((number of dots) / (2)) set [binary cards v] to (join (binary cards) (join (number of dots) [, ])) end say (binary cards)
